Sentencas: In this paper, the effects of phlogopite mica addition on the properties of barium-calcium-aluminosilicate (BCAS) glass seals are studied.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Accordingly, BCAS glass powder is mixed with up to 30 wt% of phlogopite mica; the resulting mixture is formed and sintered at different temperatures.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructure and phase content of the samples are then analyzed by scanning electron microscope (SEM) and X-ray diffraction method.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Mechanical properties including, hardness, compression strength, fracture toughness and Young's modulus are investigated.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) and softening temperature of the seals are measured.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the selected specimens is studied by applying the electrochemical impedance spectroscopy method.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The performance of the composite seals is analyzed under fuel cell working conditions by the leak test.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the samples with the mica content of more than 10 wt% cannot be sintered to near full relative density.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sintering temperature above 750 degrees C raises the risk of unfavorable reactions between mica and the BCAS glass matrix.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also revealed that the addition of 5 wt% phlogopite increases Young's modulus and fracture toughness of the BCAS glass seals by 13% and similar to 633%, respectively, without impairing other mechanical and thermal properties.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composites seals with more than 10 wt% of mica content don't meet the required mechanical properties demands for SOFC seals.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the composite seal with 5 wt% of phlogopite mica has very low electrical conductivity and leak rate of less than 1.2 x 10-4sccm/cm.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This composite seal shows high thermal stability with similar to 5% reduction in CTE after 10 cycles under SOFC working conditions and consequently can be considered as a promising seal for SOFCs.
Titulo: Barium-calcium aluminosilicate glass/mica composite seals for intermediate solid oxide fuel cells
